# AI Accounting Daily

> The leading AI tools directory and newsletter for accounting professionals.

AI Accounting Daily curates the best AI tools, news, and resources for accountants, bookkeepers, tax professionals, and finance teams. We publish a daily newsletter and maintain a comprehensive directory of 200+ AI tools.

## Main Sections

### AI Tools Directory (/tools)
Browse and discover AI tools for accounting professionals. Tools are organized by category and include detailed profiles with features, pricing, and reviews.

- /tools - Main directory with all tools
- /tools/category/accounting-bookkeeping - AI accounting and bookkeeping software
- /tools/category/tax-compliance - AI tax preparation and compliance tools
- /tools/category/payroll - AI payroll automation solutions
- /tools/category/finance-analysis - AI financial planning and analysis tools
- /tools/category/expense-management - AI expense tracking and management
- /tools/category/client-management - AI-powered CRM for accounting firms
- /tools/category/productivity - AI productivity tools for accountants
- /tools/category/hr - AI human resources tools
- /tools/category/banking-payments - AI banking and payment solutions
- /tools/submit - Submit a new AI tool to the directory

### Newsletter & News
- /subscribe - Subscribe to the daily newsletter
- /news - Browse all articles and past newsletters
- /newsletter/[date] - View archived newsletter issues

### Company
- /contactus - Contact information
- /privacypolicy - Privacy policy

## About This Site

AI Accounting Daily helps accounting professionals stay current with AI technology. The daily newsletter features curated AI news, tool recommendations, practical prompts, and industry insights.

Tool vendors can submit their AI tools for inclusion in the directory at /tools/submit. Featured and sponsored placement options are available.

## Content Types

1. **AI Tools** - Detailed profiles of AI software for accounting, including descriptions, features, pricing, and category classifications.

2. **Newsletter Issues** - Daily email newsletters covering AI news, tool spotlights, productivity tips, and industry analysis.

3. **Articles** - In-depth guides, tutorials, and analysis of AI trends in accounting.

## Contact

For partnership inquiries, tool submissions, or advertising: /contactus
